comment._content:
Thanks to everyone who already commented and tagged this video. We regret we lost the comments and tags when we improved the image and file quality. We apologize and invite you to comment and tag the new version as well.

Florida Memory

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: Impressive film footage. It's nice to see these veterans living it up.

comment._content: I noted there were no "bellies over belts" on these men. Times have changed.
